website_summaries.verdict: This good-looking watch provides the perfect balance of ruggedness and elegance – if you like both attributes, this may be the watch for you.
pros: Ion-plated gold-tone looks good and provides a bright finish
Chronograph face has a striking dark purple color
A practical watch that looks good enough to wear for dressy occasions
cons: On the large side, and is likely to need links removed for many wearers
Has a bit of a lightweight, flimsy feel

customer_reviews.title: Classy and sophisticated, and at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and perfect price. Quality gold plating, and function to go with it. The blue face is metallic and in some lights may look a little purple but definitely blue. I like that Invicta made the watch in both gloss gold and a brushed gold look, almost like a brass finish but gold tone (if that makes any sense). Definitely a stunning watch, classy and sophisticated yet not presumptuous! A perfect dress watch, but would work in almost any situation!
customer_reviews.author: Lawman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch but very easy to get little scratches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I saw a friend of mine wearing exactly the same but mix stainless gold plated so I decide to buy the whole golden plated one I have used just a couple of times. And trust me I'm a very very careful man with my brand new stuff I believe every second I spend it's worth it every drop of my sweat Show I couldn't believe when is so some minor little scratches on the watch band strap. I haven't been around any place that it could get scratch it anyways it was just a couple of times that they used it I will write a review again after I wear it a few more times.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Junior Alves Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch...Hard to Adjust Fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful watch. I collect watches, MANY worth 100's of $$$ more than this one, but it looks classy and MUCH more expensive than it is. The only problem is adjusting the links. I have NEVER had a watch that is SO difficult to get the adjustment pins out and put back in to fit my wrist. In fact, it is SO difficult I have YET to get it adjusted to fit my wrist! Nice looking watch, IF ONLY I could wear it!!
customer_reviews.author: psych-rn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watch but the paint not so durable
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty watch and calls the attention on people around you but you have to be careful when using it a long time. The paint does not last long. The bottom part of it became silver color after 1 year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Elkin Gonzalez V.

customer_reviews.title: Little big for me but look nice after a while
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but I think it’s little big for my hand, after a while it’s working perfect and the color still bright and the gold look shine and super fashion, the weight it’s little heavy for me but it’s not a bad Problem
customer_reviews.author: Adonis Fong

customer_reviews.title: I have to say it is super processed. Looks in original even better as in ...
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I bought this watch here because in Germany is a lot more expensive. It is my first quartz watch from Invicta. I have to say it is super processed. Looks in original even better as in the pictures. I'm very satisfied. The price was also unbeatable! Shipping and handling run as I know it from Amazon.de also excellent here! Thank you Amazon.com for the clean processing ......... I give the clock and Amazon.com the full 5 stars !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Käufer

customer_reviews.title: very bad, product in poor condition
customer_reviews.text: the product is defective, the watch does not work, it is of very poor quality, the supplier does not give a concrete answer and is useless. this is a scam, do not buy this bad product, the seller is not responsible, it is difficult to fulfill the customer
customer_reviews.author: Egbert Morales

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. No defects
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! Not for the faint of wrist. Had all links taken out, still a tad loose, but nothing worth returning it for. After purchasing I realized that I wasn't too fond of gold watches, but it's still a beautiful watch. I wore it once, but for the most part, it's been sitting in my display case for a few months. Still ticks, no noticable defects like other Invictas. Very stunning, and busy, if that's what you're going for.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Product as expected. Very happy with look and feel. Good price

customer_reviews.title: Had this for about 6 months and I love it. This is my go to watch for ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 6 months and I love it. This is my go to watch for working in an office and formal events. Feels like a quality piece and very easy to read. Yes it's large, which seems to be a trend for Invicta, but the price was definitely appealing compared to many of their more expensive watches.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, classy watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is great. Beautiful colors, stunning watch face, and just the right size for my wrist; the watch face may be a little big for some. This product could be improved with a better watch band. This one, and the one on another Invicta watch I have, seem to be 'cheaper' than what I would expect for the watch. They look fine and the colors match and haven't faded yet, but they don't 'feel' the same as the watch face.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy built and attractive look as expected from Invicta
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy built and attractive look as expected from Invicta. Watch ships with protective film on face and links in addition to its classic yellow box. Unbeatable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BrashBrad

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch,
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a fine looking watch that appears to be an expensive timepiece (which it isn't). Unfortunately, the "luminous" hands and numbers aren't as luminous as they should be. It's hard to read in the dark. As an early riser, I like to know what time it is when I get up and I really can't make out the time with this watch.

customer_reviews.title: Nice large watch
customer_reviews.text: The Watch is very large, too large for my wrist but it looks nice nonetheless. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because, on the band of the watch there's a spot where the gold is slowly fading away, I noticed it the first day I received it, I haven't worn it yet but I plan too once I get my link removal tool in the mail! EDIT: I finally re-sized the watch to the point where it fits my wrist just right, not too loose and not to tight but, the watch does get uncomfortable at times.

product_meta.title: Invicta Men's 14878 Specialty Chronograph Gold Ion-Plated Watch
product_meta.description:
With a bold design, this Invicta chronograph has a poised and calm ambience that’s sure to have you looking twice.

With a detailed facade displaying multi-functional subdials, this Invicta chronograph is style built with precision.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :0.59 x 0.59 x 0.59 inches; 6 Ounces
 * Item model number :14878
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :September 3, 2013
 * Manufacturer :Invicta
 * ASIN :B00EJISEBQ
 * 
 * Domestic Shipping:Item can be shipped within U.S.
 * International Shipping:This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #148,328 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #922 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #39105 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars504 ratings With a bold design, this Invicta chronograph has a poised and calm ambience that’s sure to have you looking twice.

With a detailed facade displaying multi-functional subdials, this Invicta chronograph is style built with precision.
feature_bullets: Gold ion-plated watch with textured center dial featuring unidirectional bezel and tachymeter scale on dial border
45 mm gold ion-plated stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Features chronograph functions with 60-second, 60-minute and 1/10th-second subdials, date window, and gold ion-plated stainless steel link bracelet with fold-over clasp
Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
